title: 向全服玩家发送title的指令
author: w1632050253
txt_content: 是怎么能向全服玩家发送title 或者副标题的。

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wjwrh 于 2020-6-9 15:41 编辑 

https://wiki.biligame.com/mc/%E5%91%BD%E4%BB%A4/title

title @a subtitle {"text":"The story begins…","color":"gray","italic":true}
title @a title {"text":"Chapter I","bold":true}复制代码

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
你可以试试这个插件 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-778922-1-1.html

或者 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-636807-1-1.html

replies.author: 超人152
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-724461-1-1.html

可以试下这个插件，挺好用的

replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-6-9 15:38
https://wiki.biligame.com/mc/%E5%91%BD%E4%BB%A4/title
渐入保持那个怎么写，我写成这样title @a title {"text":"Chapter I","bold":true},title @a times 1 3 1 提示错误啊

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
w1632050253 发表于 2020-6-9 15:43
渐入保持那个怎么写，我写成这样title @a title {"text":"Chapter I","bold":true},title @a times 1 3 1 ...
你第一句输title @a times 1 3 1试试
